# Empty and Edge Elements

## Single Characters

A

B

C

## Empty Looking Lines





## Minimal Content

- a
- b

1. x
2. y

## Single Word Headers

## One

### Two

#### Three

## Very Short Paragraphs

Hi.

Ok.

No.

## Empty List Items

- First
-
- Third

## Single Character Formatting

**a**

*b*

`c`

## Minimal Links

[x](https://x.com)

## Minimal Blockquote

> x

## Minimal Code Block

```
x
```

## Edge Whitespace

 Leading space.

Trailing space.

  Both spaces.

## Numbers Only

123

456

789
